tossup_question: -   –  Unconformities in the geologic record can form because of which of the following?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W)Continuous deposition
X)Erosion
Y)Volcanism
Z)Wind-blown deposition
bonus_question: -   –  During an El Niño event, what wind pattern falters, causing cold, nutrient-rich water to be trapped underneath warmer waters?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W)Jet stream
X)Horse latitudes
Y)Trade winds
Z)Westerlies
